DOC.brief_summary: To study compliance secondary prevention first month follow discharge cardiac intensive care unit ( CIC ) patient experience first episode acute coronary syndrome : quantitative compliance 3 month two principal treatment prescription ( statin - rosuvastatin , Crestor® platelet aggregation inhibitor - clopidogrel , Plavix® ) , use electronic measure system ( `` intelligent blister '' pack® ) ;
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Compliance With Management Acute Coronary Syndrome Discharge From Cardiac Intensive Care
DOC.criteria: Patient admit CIC unit first episode acute coronary syndrome , CIC cardiologist considers Crestor® rosuvastatin appropriate statin , combination platelet aggregation inhibitor ( Plavix®clopidogrel ) Patient give his/her oral consent participate study . Patient previously treat lipidlowering drug . Patient known history coronary heart disease .
